name: Wingback
headline: Wingback provides tools and APIs for SaaS pricing and packaging.
description: Wingback provides tools and APIs for SaaS pricing and packaging. We are infrastructure that allows SaaS startups to deploy any set of features of their product using any pricing model. It enables non-technical teams to implement pricing and packaging changes and execute product-led growth campaigns without engineering involvement.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:api; industry:enterprise; industry:infrastructure; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Torben Friehe, Founder
founders.description: I've been fascinated by technology since early childhood, which led me to founding 1aim, an IoT startup. I ran 1aim together with my co-founder Yann for seven years before it was acquired. After that, I provided advice to some founder friends. In late 2020, I joined On Deck. After many conversations with On Deck fellows in SaaS, Yann and I started building Wingback. Besides startups, I'm interested in Formula 1, cars, and planes, but also in architecture, fashion, and history.

### Self-serve / High Touch
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/648ae0b36554e41262a168f6_stack-g-new.svg)
# Leverage feature usage data for Price setting
### !! Grow your business with hybrid pricing and feature-based billing in Wingback
With our platform, you're equipped to thrive in every transaction, maximizing value for every feature, and every customer
# Wingback Solution Overview
Wingback’s low-code approach allows any non-technical user to manage everything pricing & billing related.
# Pricing Plan Editor
Create feature-based pricing plans using any pricing model you can imagine.
# Customer Management Portal
Assign plans, upgrade or downgrade any customer, and edit their billing data.
# **Self-Serve Billing Portal**
Enable customers to upgrade on their own and access their invoices too.
# Pricing Page Editor
Create pricing pages that your customers will use to signup for your product.
# Integrations & Webhooks
CRM & accounting integrations and webhooks make sure we fit into your stack.
# Wingback Solution Overview
Wingback’s low-code approach allows any non-technical user to manage everything pricing & billing related.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/6609ab77fc80485a1d3f5ed9_plan.png)
# Pricing Plan Editor
Create feature-based pricing plans using any pricing model you can imagine.
# Customer Management Portal
Assign plans, upgrade or downgrade any customer, and edit their billing data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/6609a906dca39409e0a72ee6_plan-manager.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/6609a8cd8dae61ccc01a5912_billing.png)
# Self-Serve Billing Portal
Enable customers to upgrade on their own and access their invoices too.
# Pricing Page Editor
Create pricing pages that your customers will use to signup for your product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/6609a88ed4cb0876d0f81e0e_pricing-pages.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/66107ab23cefc9f993f0fc2d_metrics-analytics.png)
# Analytics Dashboard
Track your MRR, churn, and other important KPIs accurately across both PLG and high-touch sales channels.
# Product pricing = Product value
Your product's pricing should equal the value your customer receives. This value differs from customer to customer. Creating customer-specific hybrid pricing plans using Wingback allows you to adapt your pricing on an individual basis.
[Learn More](https://www.wingback.com/</blog/why-value-based-pricing-is-becoming-the-preferred-pricing-strategy-for-saas-startups>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c794b77ec90a469b620ac9_product-1.svg)
# This is your product
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7a83f9e14ce5f9ebd6e22_product-1-2.svg)
# Wingback allows you to balance those two
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7969782e68a9e09ee4823_product-3.svg)
# This is YOUR product when you use wingback
# Don't guess - Rely on data
Wingback records customer usage-data for customers won through PLG and high-touch sales channels. This granular dataset allows you to build highly optimized hybrid pricing plans without guesswork.
[Learn More](https://www.wingback.com/</blog/hybrid-pricing-explained>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7b590fd204fb45bad2f03_product-2-1.svg)
# This is how you guess how to price your product
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7b5d6fd204fb45bad5383_product-2-2.svg)
# This is Wingback analyzing usage data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7b61fbf275b9feb6d7c10_product-2-3.svg)
# These are your data-driven pricing plans
# Automate revenue growth
Wingback detects churn risk and upsell opportunities by analyzing usage data. It pushes this data into your other systems and even allows you to set up automated actions that lead to less churn and more upsells.
[Learn More](https://www.wingback.com/</by-feature/pricing-experimentation-optimization>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7b6a04ffc10e174b5e46e_product-3-1.svg)
# This is Wingback monitoring your usage data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7b6e7f4ec4e1316bc94b3_product-3-2.svg)
# This is Wingback recognizing behavior patterns
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c7b73a7509c8cb43c66aff_product-3-3.svg)
# This is the result of reduced costs and more revenue
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64037317422e3a2291bd4bca/65c1a923c6803882d395fe41_Exit%20Icon.svg)

generated_description:
**Wingback: Revolutionizing SaaS Pricing and Packaging**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the Y Combinator W22 batch, Wingback is a startup positioned in San Francisco that's making significant waves in the SaaS pricing infrastructure space. Their mission is straightforward yet impactful: to provide tools and APIs that empower SaaS companies to implement flexible pricing and packaging strategies without the need for deep technical involvement. This means that non-technical teams can efficiently execute changes and spearhead product-led growth campaigns.

**What Does Wingback Offer?**

Wingback's platform is essentially an enabling technology for SaaS startups, allowing them to deploy a range of features with various pricing models. This flexibility opens doors to unlimited possibilities, including:

- **Feature Entitlements**: Manage what features different customer tiers can access.
- **Quoting**: Simplified process for sales teams to create quotes.
- **Self-Serve Sign-Up**: Let customers onboard themselves easily.
- **Plan Creation & Management**: Craft custom pricing plans based on user needs and behaviors.
- **Billing & Payments**: Streamlined processes for handling transactions.

Their approach leans heavily on a low-code philosophy which minimizes the need for engineering resources. This is particularly noteworthy in today’s fast-paced startup environment where speed to market can be the difference between success and oblivion.

**The Team and Support**

While Wingback operates with a compact team of twelve, they benefit from strategic guidance, including from Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne. Their diverse offerings cater to varying roles within organizations—ranging from sales to customer success—ensuring that all stakeholders can leverage the platform effectively.

**Why Wingback Matters**

In an era where businesses are increasingly looking for agile and scalable solutions to meet customer demands, Wingback stands out by aligning pricing with the actual value delivered to customers. Their solutions enable companies to experiment with pricing models, detect churn risks, and identify upsell opportunities—all key factors that can drive significant revenue growth.

For those navigating the complexities of SaaS pricing, Wingback is a formidable ally that combines flexibility, power, and ease of use. You can explore more about their offerings on their [website](https://www.wingback.com). Whether you're a startup or an established SaaS company, aligning your pricing strategy with your growth ambitions has never been easier.
